code: import axios from'axios';var url='https://petition-rate.herokuapp.com/petitions';export var fetchPetitions=function fetchPetitions(){return axios.get(url);};export var createPetition=function createPetition(newPetition){return axios.post(url,newPetition);};export var votePetition=function votePetition(id,userid){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id,"/").concat(userid,"/votePetition"));};export var updatePetition=function updatePetition(id,updatedPetition){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),updatedPetition);};export var deletePetition=function deletePetition(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};
